# activate(_:)

**Type Method**

Activates each constraint in the specified array.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func activate(_ constraints: [NSLayoutConstraint])
```

## Parameters

- **constraints**: An array of constraints to activate.

## Discussion

This convenience method provides an easy way to activate a set of constraints with one call. The effect of this method is the same as setting the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSLayoutConstraint/isActive] property of each constraint to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. Typically, using this method is more efficient than activating each constraint individually.

## Activating and deactivating constraints

- **isActive**: The active state of the constraint.
- **deactivate(_:)**: Deactivates each constraint in the specified array.
